definition: pink collar/woman working in the service industry
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: After graduation from college, She underwent several setbacks and finally decided to be a pink-collared worker.
sentences.chinese: 大学毕业后，几经周折，她最终成了一名粉领。

definition: older female/woman of mature years (Japanese loanword)
abbr. for 侍應生|侍应生[shi4 ying4 sheng1]
single girl who is not interested in relationships, living a lackadaisical life (loanword from Japanese "himono onna")
"a slave to certificates", sb who does one's utmost to obtain as many certificates as possible so to be more employable
(Tw) naive and innocent (girl or boy)/underage prostitute/(Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [iù-khí])
housewife/woman of senior authority in a household/the lady of the house/hostess
